name: verma nakul

nakul-py/CosmosJourneyer.summary: This repository has seen active development today, with significant changes to the project's infrastructure, including replacing webpack with vite and addressing several issues in the planetary landing logic. Additionally, there were multiple pull requests and merges today.

nakul-py/Python.summary: Today saw the addition of a pre-commit hook to the Python repository, which now uses a Git hook to ensure consistency and quality in the project's code base.

profile_summary: I'm Verma Nakul, a seasoned software developer with expertise in C++ and JavaScript, with a proven track record of consistently delivering high-quality solutions. Through my 48 public repositories, I have demonstrated my ability to take on complex problems and break them down into efficient, scalable code. With a strong foundation in programming fundamentals and a passion for problem-solving, I continue to drive innovation and growth in the tech community.
